content.detailedDescription: Driving west bound on rt 231 about5 miles from my first sighting a few years ago.  i was a mile or two past a little town called leroy.  i was one the cell phone with my dad when i noticed a bright light behind me i first thought that its was a cop with his spot light getting ready to pull me over but then i suddenly moved closer and then to the side of my vehicle. my cell phone cut out and lost signal my radio went to static and my high beams went out.  the super bright white light then moved behind and then passed me ( like a person in a vehicle wouls pulled into the opposite lane and sped up then pulled in front of me)  the objectthen slowed and came along side of me and followed beside me for about 1.5 miles and abruptly disappeared as a approach the street light at i-65 rt 231 junction as soon as it diappeared the street lights went out and i pulled onto the interstat and as i came over the overpass and reach the bottom of the hill the street lights came back on my cell phone regained signal and my radio went back to music. i proceeded homa and called my dad told him what happend and when i got home as i was pulling into the driveway my high beams suddenly turned on. i went inside and started talking to my dad and noticed my dog acting very strange she was standing back from the window and barking at something out side then a sudden flah (like one from a camera) happend outside and the dog ran to the window and started growling and barking.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Followed by a ball of light while driving.

content.detailedDescription: 2 white bright light roundish somethings hovering above traffic in town.
content.summary: Parnormal phenomenon

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my brothers house helping him and his wife settle in,they had just
bought the house about a month earlier.We had finished what we we're doing
and we're standing in the driveway saying our goodbyes when a glint of light from the sun caught my attention,i looked up just in time to see a silver
sphere come out of the suns glare and move west to east across the sky.It moved at a fairly rapid speed and when i asked my brother"did you see that"
it was gone.It was pretty high in the sky about we're private jets fly.
i've had people tell me it was probably a satellite but i've seen
satellites before and they don't move that fast.It wasn't as fast as 
i could turn my head but it was faster than a jet at comparable altitude.After the incident my brother claimed to see the delta style
crafts on several occasions.I can't verify his sightings as he passed away last october but he was very adamant about what he saw.All i know is what
 i saw and i don't care if anybody believes me.
content.summary: Silver sphere passed over my head

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what the vessel looked like but four small vehicles came out of the back and went of in different directions.After about ten minutes they came back and went back the way they came back toward the bomb plant.I was going to pick up my girlfrind and i was going from olar to barnwel south carolina when i saw an object in the ski.Itwas a large object and it made no noise. foure smaller objects came out of the back of the object and went around the object and went of in four different directions.In about ten to fifteen minutes they came back.Then it went back the way it came toward tha bomb plant.I felt that it was ufo and i went to get my mother to witness the object but i don't know if she saw it or not,i don't remember.
content.summary: I saw a ufo in the ski and four small objects came out of the back of it and went around it and went of in different directions

content.detailedDescription: Open the attachement all the way. enlarge all the way. go lower left to scale about 30. see head. go up see pillar rock what is wraped around rock. or go to nasa site spirit rover press release photo march 2006 and down load for your self and enlarge.
content.summary: Head on mars from spirit rover march 2006

content.detailedDescription: Looping star across the horizon, like a cursive e written across the sky over and over
content.summary: Looping across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling noerth bound on county line road and as a came apon a corn feild i notice a bright orgish colored light in the tree line about 100+ yards from the road. i imediatley slowed the vehicle to about 30mph. as i continued to drive the object came out of the trees adnd hovered about 50 yards out in the feild and followed me for about a 1/2 to 3/4 of a mile.  i am a vollunteer fire fighter and i pulled over and then turned on my blue lights and imediatley the orb turned from oragish color to a super bright white flashed once at me then vanish into thin air.  my emotions were of simple awe and wonder i never imagined this would happen to me.... this was my first encounter i have had 3
content.summary: Ball of light followed me down the road about half a mile

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east bound on highway 60 in mesa spotted dark cloud over the superstition mountains. dark cloud had a dome top and flat bottom and was giant in size compared to mountain. dark cloud did not match any clouds in the area.

my passenger noticed it 1st and told me about it i was driving.
as soon as myself and passenger started looking at the object it flattened out and disappeared about 1 minute of action.
content.summary: Giant stationary disc over mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in an open field on our farm. it was cold and getting dark about dusk. no clouds in the sky. i turned to call the dog and looked to the western sky and saw 2 cigar (though wider) shaped bright lights.I kept looking and gazed into one hard to see if any movement inside the light and there seems to be some movement. it was very bright. they never moved but just sat in the sky. i kept looking back and forth at them as they hovered. as i looked from one to the other, a trail of little lights came from one. they then began to disappear or fade. one finally did and as i turned my back which was only for a very short time, both disappeared.I just kept praying and asking god to show me what it was as i just could not believe this. these objects must have been huge if they had been closer because at a distance they were big. found out another person had seen this too and actually stopped their car and got out to view.I was not afraid just shocked to see these things. i wondered if anyone was looking at me from them which was unnerving. the objects coming out were much smaller and i would estimate about 10-15 of them and they just disappeared into the air as they were coming out. did anyone else see anything that time of day and on that day? by the way, i always take my cell with me as i walk but of all times i left it in the car and could not get a pic. i know what i saw was real.
content.summary: 2 of them. very bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: i was at the top of the predential center in boston ma and i sighted a small white object to be appeared as a airplane but i looked after recording the video that it was not. the object was not moving.
content.summary: Small white object sighting from predential center tower.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a golden light behind trees. it was stationary, i really wasn't sure what it was. when i came back later it was gone.I noticed it there ,because it wasn't there earlier.I had been awake as usual.Got a really strange feeling.
content.summary: Golden light behind trees

content.detailedDescription: While vacationing with my family in england we went to the town of honiton, we ventured up roundball hill which over looked the town, we took some photos and when we got back home we looked at one and saw a strange object in one of them, we didn't see it at  the time and have no idea what it is?
content.summary: Vacation snap, honiton england

content.detailedDescription:
These incidents happened between 1976 and 1978.

during my childhood, my family and friends traveled to nearby pond mountain every saturday evening in the summer months to view a strange situation that nobody has ever been able to explain. pond mountain is one of the tallest peaks in the appalachian mountains and is very secluded. 

my friends father was a preacher and he commonly held outdoor sermons in a field near pond mountain. the congregation spotted red lights, off in the distance, rising into space every 3 minutes.

we would go to this field every saturday night and sit in a field atop a knoll just off of the dirt road and watched the red lights rise vertically high into the night sky. they couldn't have been cars or vehicles driving up a mountain because the lights continued to rise up into the stars until they dimly faded out of sight. the lights would launch every three minutes (to the second) and would continue to do so for hours. there was no noise associated with these lights...They were just small red lights rising into space.

upon returning home after one night of viewing, i was riding in a car with my friend. we topped a hill on the way back home and a huge glowing green light came out of nowhere and blinded my friends father to the point where he had to stop the car. we didn't hear any noises with the lights and the lights disappeared as quickly as they appeared. everyone was visibly shaken and my friends father turned to ask if we had seen the bright light. our hearts were pounding as we told him we had witnessed it as well. we sat and discussed what it could have possibly been (swamp gas, hunters spot lights, helicopters) but couldn't agree on what it might have been. we never returned again...As we felt endangered.

i left the area upon graduating high school and returned 20 years later. i was telling one of my childhood friends of the sightings and he had something to add. he explained that he had witnessed those same lights and returned several times during daylight hours to investigate. he told me of a brick outhouse looking building just off the road in the woods near the area where we used to view the strange lights. he said he watched two u.S. government vehicles park near this small structure and the individuals would enter the outhouse and not come out for a full day. he suspected it was an elevator shaft leading to an underground facility.

after hearing what my friend had to say, i suspected it may have been a top secret military project...But i don't know.

maybe you can combine this with other stories and conclude what this mystery was/is.
content.summary: We never figured out what it was...

content.detailedDescription:
Taking photographs to the sunset, in a place that is clear of buildings to the west, (ihave been there may times, just 10 minutes from home) i discovered what i thought it was a bird at first, when isaw it in the second of a series of over 100 pictures, when reviewing them next day. i didn't see personally the object. i took this picture because of the bright green contrast and grey and brown colors. i thought it was nice. i am also a painter and i like to take color samples from nature (see my page www.Littlenova.Net)
i am also an active glider pilot since 1991.I know local birds (mostly sparrows and blackbirds, some doves and storks in the cities). & miles from the spot is torrejon af base.  13 miles away is madrid barajas airport

mi coordinates while taking the picture:
n40��������� 33' 10"
w3��������� 20' 26"

the object was on vector 275��������� from my position. i estimate a distance of half a mile to one mile, to the object.

the sun was on direction approx 245���������

time: 17:39
temp. +3��������� c
wind north 5 knots
the camera is olympus 500uz, 6mp, x10 zoom. the picture was taken with maximum zoom (x10), automatic foucs and settings.
content.summary: Discovered the image when reviewing pictures taken the day before

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on route 17 in nys approaching nys thruway tolls at harriman.
triangular light formation at dusk. widening and contracting for 3-4 minutes. this was then followed by spectacular event of 15-20 pulsating lights, each of tremendous size spanning over a mile in width. the large lights were pulsating much like an airport runway and each light was tremendous in size. lasted for a minute. this was above the harriman state park mountains, away from the woodbury outlets and stewart airport. a truly spectacular event that cannot be understood. only one other witness. trying to find more witnesses.
content.summary: Spectacular pulsating blue, red, green lights spanning 1-2 miles in width

content.detailedDescription: 1/16/10 at approximately 2:45 am, two adults out camping within the toyabe national park.  we were 15 miles south of the town of austin nevada.  my honey and i noticed for approximately 10 minutes an object we could not identify it was hovering with lights that were opalesant in various colors blue red and greens.  stayed still lights seemed to be changing fast. at the time of 2:45 am my honey went outside of our tent trailer to get me a soft drink and noticed the object in the sky.  the next morning we noticed something in our tent trailer that could not be explained as to how it got there.  the larger of our beds in the tent trailer had become very wet and had a large 24 inch circumfance of being wet and could not be explained on how it happened.  it was a creppy feeling out there in no where land and could not explain the incident.  all i know is i was uneasy and i was spooked.
content.summary: 2 people witness blue,red opalesant lights hovering the east mtns. above austin lights ufo was still standing for about ten minutes and quickly within 2 seconds disappeared up into the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Returning home from friends, heading east on hwy 64 from red river, nm to bobcat pass (elev-9800 ft), 36.68 deg n - 105.35 deg w, and noticed red fireball with blinking lights which appeared to be on top of the mountain above our house. first reaction was it was a snow cat (plow) on top of peak. then realized there is no snow runs above us and there is no way for a vehicle to reach that point. getting closer it was clear it was in sky but low on horizon, a fireball,intense and we thought it was a helicopter with search lights and maybe it was on fire. then object started moving and shining bright white(almost led in appearance) down on ground. movement was slow to west then abrubtly back east very short distances.Object moved up and down with movement not capable of helicopter unless it was falling out of sky, then shooting straight up to original position. we continued driving to mountain pass as object moved northwest quickly. object stopped completely above us then with incredible speed moved due north, then slowed briefly colors fading. at this moment it just vanished in a streak northwest into the clear night sky. 
my wife and i were at first concerned that something was on fire so near our house and we live next to a national forest. after realizing this was something extraordinary we gave chase to get a better view and perhaps a picture with camera phone. picture taking unsuccessful except for one bright streak in a black backround. we actually got a little scared, excited and now can not sleep. this event has changed our lives, to what degree we are unsure but we will be more aware of the sky and hope that we can see something else and pray whatever happens is not malevolent but enlightening.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireball, blinking lights, erratic movements, slow then unbelievable speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home when my four year old son said "mommy look airplane" as i pulled into my apartments and saw an object very low to the ground and almost looked to be hovering.  the object was triangle shape with three very bright white lights one on the top "point" and the second and third on the bottom two forming a triangle all lights equally spaced.  at the top of the "triangle object's" first light was a beam almost foggy looking beam of light going straight out like a head light. my first thought was helicopter - i turned my music off, rolled my window down and heard nothing.  i pulled my cellphone out in an attempt to take a picture/video but my cellphone was not picking up the lights - and then i received a call.  i was confused saying "what the hell is that?" as i slid my car to get into my gated apartments.  i then turned and got off my phone in my second attempt to take a picture or video when the object was gone.  completely and totally gone literally as if it had vanished into thin air. i pulled up to my apartment again on my cellphone trying to look into the cloudy sky wondering how if i can not see stars could i see this object and where did it go? 

once i got into my house i searched triangle ufo's just to see and there it was some more than other because the object that i saw was very clearly triangle with 3 white not blue not read or yellow but white lights, none of them mentioned a foggy looking headlight/beam(?).
content.summary: Triangle object with three bright white lightsand beam of light almost like headlight

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went outside in front of our home at approximately 6:30pm saturday, february 6th, 2010 to finish shoveling snow. i picked up a scoop of snow with my shovel and turned around to throw it over our fence and when i did, i saw two round lights hovering in the northeast, towards annapolis, md going very slowly and close together. i said to my husband, "what the heck is that!" they were two bright round yellow circles. if you were looking at a clock, one was at 10 o'clock and one was at 5o'clock, but very close together. we watched them for approximately 30 seconds. then, one of the lights turned off and then the other and then they were gone. it reminded me of the lights over phoenix how they went out, but here there were only two lights. i know these lights were not planes. there was no noise. i have never seen anything like this. my heart was racing and i could feel the adrenaline pumping. we were outside until about 7:40pm and didn't see anything else.
content.summary: Shoveling snow, turned around and saw two lights in the northeast sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was siting alone in my garden on a warm summer night after midnight facing south.  there was a full moon with a large bank of clouds between me and it. the clouds were very bright. i was suddenly startled by the appearance of a black triangle moving to the ne.  i bolted to my feet saying what the heck was that. i never told anyone as i had never heard the words "black triangle". about a month ago i decided to google the words black triangle.  to my surprise there were pages of information.  i was relived that i wasn't alone with this experience.
sincerely,
kevin j murphy ph.D.

ps: not sure on date as i made no attempt to remember.
content.summary: Black triangle came out of the south and flew north east.

content.detailedDescription: I had to get up around 2am to take dogs out to backyard to go potty. while standing out there half asleep my  dog started to growl towards other side of finger across from me(i live on a lake down a finger).I looked to the other side of finger and noticed what appeared to be a very large object crouched down with a sort of cape draped down.All of a sudden all of my dogs were looking across finger and starting to bark .I called for the dogs to come inside now because the neighbors get sort of upset when dogs are barking, while looking at this object at same time. all of a sudden it stood up and could see greenish colored eyes on it. i got scared and yelled at dogs to get in now!I looked back up and this being was now flying in air towards me and flew along sideways and stared at me and flew away.I was scared and dogs were too.Next day it was back to normal.Evening came around and i was still rather shook up about the day before.About 11pm that night i took the dogs out a little earlier hoping they would sleep till morning .It was and errie feeling standing out there. i looked hard but didnt see that being across the finger from me anymore. i looked up to skies and it was very clear. so clear that the sky looked really strange .I looked harder and started to notice that there was a line of an object in sky almost the size of a football field above me in the sky .As i looked more closely i noticed that the stars on the inside of this black lining were brighter than regular stars. what i was actually seeing was a massive ship attempting to camoflauge its underbelly as the sky. i stared a little more and then a sharp instant pain entered my abdomen.I immediately felt my mind very confused and it was telling me to go back inside now or else.I cannot explain what happened at that moment .Only can tell u that 2 weeks later was in hospital with total with major complications almost dying from  massive bacterial infection) and almost died.Had to be off 2/1/2 months off of work and havent been the same since.Cant remember things.Simple things. i am only 48 years i should not be experiencing alzheimers already. what i seen was very real and has made me realize something. i used to get excieted about ufos. no more. something else happend the year before but i will relay if and when u r ready .I live in helendale and about 2 miles from an airbase  .Strange things happen there all the time. all of those people  that live in surrounding area  of this base say they see small round lit balls (orbs) flying around at night.Thank you for letting me tell u about my experience .
content.summary: First sighting of being on ground. 2nd sighting of massive ship

content.detailedDescription:
at 2:45 pm today my family and 2 of my son's friends were all in the backyard helping my husband with a carpentary project. i was sitting on a bench visiting with my mother when i noticed what i thought were 5 geese flying in a v formation from east to west .After looking at them for a couple of seconds i was shocked realizing that they were not geese since the sun was reflecting upon them showing that they were actually metalic sphere objects.Today the sky  is clear and it is about 65 degrees.
 with excitiment i yelled ufo's and the 3 boys came running to see. i pointed them out  and then i  ran into the house to get the binocualrs.When i got back outside i tried to focus on the objects but i was to shaky so i handed them to my sons friend.We were all screaming and laughing that we couldn't believe what we were seeing.
as they started to go behind the tree line we ran to the coral area in front of the house to continue watching them.One of the spheres shot off back towards the east disapearing as the other four continued steady and equal distance on to the north/west- towards  austins bergtrom airport. they slowy just disapered. right before they vanished a white prop plane was traveling near and behind them to their south. the plane must have seen them. we heard the plane but no noise from the objects.The plane seemed to have been traveling faster than the spheres.
the funny thing is one of my son's friends was a sceptic until this afternoon. he even said that he wished he a gotten a picture for the news.
it is 2 hours later and we are still excited and talking about the event,especially since it was a daytime sighting!
content.summary: at first thought there were 5 geese in a v formation then noticed that they were metalic shphere like objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from macomb il and for some reason i just pulled into a gas station in goodhope, my wife made me stop to use the bathroom not sure how long i was there but i got back in the car and started driving home, if i hadnt stopped there i wouldnt have seen it. i looked out the driver side window and noticed three green lights in a triangle moving fast and pretty low about a thousand feet id say. when it passed over us we immediately looked out the passenger window and watched it separate into three separate lights moving indifferent directions one forward one left one right. i dont know what it was but it was really neat.
content.summary: Green lights triangle

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just got back home from going to sonic to get some food. we took the dogs out in the back yard, and were looking at the clear skies, the stars were really bright. we stayed out for a couple of minutes, and noticed all sorts of planes, low and high altitudes, doing their normal airplane-stuff, like going places, or practicing for something. nothing unusual at all, until my wife asks, "did you see that strobe next to orion?" at this time, 6:40, orion was in the southeast skies, about 80��� or less. it strobed again, and i did see it, it was near orion's bow, almost directly south of us, again around 70-80��� up. it seemed blue, like a xenon strobe, so i conjectured that it was probably a high alt. airplane, going west at assumably 30-50,000 ft. my wife tells me "it was just going the other direction though..." as i've now seen it strobe about 4-5 times, i am noticing the path is strangely unpredictable. i tell her i am noticing its wandering as well, it has no predictable motion, and just flashes 9-10 seconds apart, like clockwork, but shows up in random nearby locations. i ran inside, grabbed the handycam and tripod, and caught the flash! by the time i'd actually gotten the camera set-up, it had moved back southeast towards orion's head (i don't know if that funny-shaped triad of stars above his shoulders is supposed to be his head, but that's where it was at this time). i thought for sure i wouldn't be able to get it, but i did! it's not too exciting, it's a 9-10 second strobe wandering around, it looks yellow on film, i had to use night shot to increase exposure, and it discolored it from how it visually appeared(blue). since i have 20 minutes of really good video, with lots of reference stars, and a sporadically stationary camera, i'll stop describing the event and let the video do the talking. here's what i think...It was not a satellite, they either move, or they don't, and this was jumping all over...I couldn't keep a close focus w/o it jumping off frame repeatedly. it was not an airplane, they can "orbit" at many altitudes, i see a c-130 doing it almost every night over our airport around 5-10,000 ft, sometimes reconnaisance or surveys are done this way...But this wasn't "orbiting." it had no circular or straight line path, just complete randomness. not to mention, i've 'caught' airplanes flying cross-country w/our handycam, you can always see nav lights w/the strobe, even way up there. i thought maybe it could be an elaborate prank, a signal strobe hung from a balloon could maybe do that, but i'd think w/ our recent weather pattern (frontal passage), a balloon wouldn't stick around for 30 minutes w/out blowing away, or blowing up from depressurization. it wasn't a meteor, or an asteroid, i've seen hundreds, and none of them have ever taken anything but a deliberate staight-line path, and quickly. perhaps the gov't has some top-secret super-manuever craft that jumps from place to place aimlessly w/ no sound at high altitudes, but besides that being silly in function, it's not so secret w/ a bright blue strobe on it. after filming it for an exhausting 20 minutes, we decided we'd go eat our now cold fast food. my hands were getting tired chasing it back and forth across the sky anyhow. when we finished our food, i went back out and it was completely cloudy. i made a dvd of the handycam video, i'll send it in (that would take way too long to upload it).
content.summary: Strobing craft @ high alt., around orion constellation

content.detailedDescription: I left my house and was driving through langhorne, pennsylvania.  the direction i was traveling in was the direction from the sheraton hotel to la fitness on north oxford valley road.  it was late at night, around 10:30-10:35 ish. i noticed a huge rigid, spherical light in the sky on the horizon past la fitness.  it was emanating lights and glows like a small star would, only this large light object was high in the sky and was not the size of a star at all.  no quick movement came from the object, it was moving slow.  i would like to tell you that i was able to understand its path of direction but i lost site of the object a few times because of tall buildings and trees as i was driving. it wasn't a plane because it was a lot larger than the two other planes i saw in the sky moving at the same time this object was; so i was able to compare both the airplanes and this large light object.  i watched this light for about four minutes and then it disappeared, no more light emanated anymore and i couldn't see the object either as well.  when it disappeared, i was able to get a full view of it as it disappeared since there was nothing in my way (buildings, trees etc.) at all at that time when i was nearing toward la fitness.  the feeling i felt was, i finally got to witness a ufo sighting.  it all caught me by surprise and i told another man at the gym what i saw and he said he saw the same thing.  i explained to him what i saw and he said "yeah, what was that?".  he said it didn't look like a plane at all to him because of the size but he did not see it disappear because he got to the gym before i did.  i think he brushed the situation off his shoulder,  he wasn't as enthusiastic as i was about the object.
content.summary: Large, rigid, spherical shape that eminated glows like a star.

content.detailedDescription:
I opened my living room blinds to take some snapshots of the recent snow to forward to my two sisters, one lives in georgia, the other in arizona
and there was a quick flicker or flash and i took the shot.
i took other snapshots within minutes, one of a squirrel eating from my
bird suet cage and another in  the same direction of the first which was 1 minute, 6 seconds later, i didn't have a flash on and the sun does not
rise in that location so i know it was not that.
i downloaded the camera onto the computer and there was the first picture/image showing a glow/flash that illuminated the area but the strange part was the lights/headlights above the glow.
you could see new jersey in the distance and the street lights still on by the john fitch way, a major highway in that state.
the glow had what looked like a tunnel with orbs according to my wife who saw the images. my one sister said it could have been the rising sun but the next day i took several snapshots of that and the sun rises in a different direction in new jersey.
i am most certain i didn't have the flash on because the second image was clear and visible. the lights above this glow was about 6-8 lights and it was in the sky and could not have been from the new jersey highway.
my neighbors fence across the canal was visible and the glow/light was
behind that and trees were visible. if this was an error on part of my camera, i could live with that but i just don't know. i am retired and never had submitted anything to anyone and the only ones that i told or sent images to were my sisters and one to your organization that same day.
content.summary: Flash glow for a minute or more.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way home from work in the middle of the day, and i was in the passenger seat relaxing. i was looking up through the sunroof at the clear blue sky...Nothing else on my mind but going home...I am a very reliable business owner and this is something i have dealt with for a few months and have decided it needs to be reported... we were headed south on 285 and we were near the atlanta airport...I will reitterate that this was not a plane or anything simular...I was very coherent...
out of the deepest part that you can see when lookin up at the blue sky, i saw a large round gold metal (no lights) very detailed object appear...It was stationairy and the object did not fly in any direction...It was stationary...I am very familiar with planes, etc...I thought it might be a satellite or something but after researching...No way...
it appeared to be about the size of 5-10+ planes in width from the height it was at compared to planes, and, appeared to have lost it's invisability for a miniute or so because before i could get my emotions in tact and grab my cell phone to take a picture it started to dissappear again out of site with a slight fog around it then nothing?...Just the clear blue sky again?
content.summary: Stationairy gold round detailed metal large object appeared out of clear blue sky...

content.detailedDescription: We lived in the countryside of clovis at that time. back than it was acres of lands and forest of oranges trees. i was around 13-14 year of age now i���m 26. i never thought in my life i would get the chance to see what i have seen that night. i have seen ufos on tv and books but never this close and the feeling of that night still in my mine to this day. i told family members but they don���t believe me. i don���t really care if they don���t because i know what i saw. i���m happy that it was me. if i could go back in time to that night i would have woke up somebody like my mom and maybe just maybe people would believe me. it happen like this... i don���t remember the exact day or year but i think it was (june of 1995). i remember it was a warm night around 2am. the first thing that i heard was a loud noise high pitch sounds (like a earthquake) with a high pitch. i thought it was an earthquake cause it did the same effect like in the movies. pics on the wall was moving and the floor was shaking. but something was different about this suddenly it stop. i felt light somehow something i my head tells me that there something over the house. i didn���t worry too much because that wake me up and i needed to pee. the sounds lasted about a min not long so i woke up and started my way to the bathroom which was about 8 feet way around the comer. as i was taking a piss i heard a scratching sound coming from outside the bathroom window there was a tree about 3 stories high and the ufo had scratched the bottom of its ship to the tip of the tree branches. that caught my attention i look up and there it was a disc like shape ufo.  the ufo had a light at the top and several lights on the side there was no sounds (nothing period) coming from it.  the thing was flowing in mid air and moving at 1-3 mph and what���s special about this was. it was searching for something.  i don���t know what but i know it was searching for something because there was an extra light on the bottom of the ship and it was moving. as the light on the bottom was moving i notice that there was spot light on the ground as big as the ufo when the light(bottom) of the ship was moving  the spot light on the ground was moving also. so i know that it was searching and not just flying by. there was no light beam coming from the ufo at all i remember for sure this was the most amazing thing i ever saw in my life.  this ufo was big about 30-35 ft wide.  the thing that shock me the most was there was no sound coming from it as it was moving away at 1-3 mph. i watch it flow away and i told myself is this real did i just saw a ufo. i been watching sighting of ufos on tv  and some are close to what i saw that night but the lights are different in a way that i don���t think it���s a real one. you can see the lights on the side of the ship. well that���s  my encounter with the ufo thanks for reading and i hope to see one more before i died.
content.summary: This is real..No dream.

content.detailedDescription:
I sent an email as my husband is freaking out over the phone right now.  our email is scorpion1@fuse.Net.  i will try to copy and paste what i wrote below.

first let me say that my husband is a big non-believer in ufo���s���  he drives a truck from ohio to laredo, tx every week and has just called me to tell me that while driving down interstate 35 (south) in tx, he saw a bunch of flashing lights and all of a sudden it started moving quite fast and in many different directions and then took off so quickly he had barely blinked and it was gone.  the closest i can explain as to where he states he saw this ufo out in the desert of texas is as follows:

interstate 35 south between mile markers 74 and 77. he stated that it was very close to the interstate by him.  he states that he had just passed mile marker 75 when it disappeared a few minutes ago. (10:20pm est) i believe that is 9:20pm central time in texas.  the towns i can see on our maps for these mile markers are millett and gardendale, tx.  if you have anyone else call in or contact you about this sighting we would be appreciative as he is freaking out about what he thinks he actually saw as i said before, he is a non believer until now.

he thought it was an airplane until it started moving in all different directions as it got closer.
content.summary: Saw flashing and extremely quick motion in many directions and then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I���������m sorry, i could write the  story  in english but i might left important information out, that���������s why i���������d rather write in spanish.

era aproximadamente mediodia, estaba en un campo descubierto, en una zona rural en las afueras de lima  capital del per���������, mi objetivo era fotografiar varios angulos de una propiedad agricola, dispare la camara cerca de 50 veces en diferentes direcciones, pues queria tener fotos panor���������micas desde diferentes ���������ngulos, conclui el trabajo y me fui a casa.

aqui existe la creencia que esa zona, asi como otras en el peru, es una zona caliente, es decir  que es comun ver ufos (ovnis) , yo la he visitado muchas veces sin ver nada especial, hasta que revise las fotos que tome y encontre cosas (naves, creo yo) que no vi en el momento en que dispare la camara, no habia ruido ,ni gente que me molestara, como es campo abierto no habia nada que me distrajera, ni siquiera habia nubes (estamos en pleno verano) pero lo que me parece dificil de entender es porque no pude verlas a simple vista y tampoco oir nada.

aparecen varios objetos (ufos) de  varias formas  en grupos de 2, 3 y 15 (dos cigarros rodeados de 12 esferas negras) las formas: esf���������ricas negras, largas tipo cigarro, o lanza, otra en forma de disco y uno con forma de pescado ( visto de perfil)  bastante rara.  sospecho que fue cuestion de suerte, pero intentare fotografiar m���������s y con mejor resolucion.

les enviare solo una foto , si pueden revisarla veran en la  parte central derecha, sobre los cerros, el ovni en forma de pescado, en la siguiente toma, aparece 2 o 3 kilometros mas adelante, pero en esa misma toma aparacen dos objetos m���������s: uno directamante encima de mi y otro casi imperceptible en el fondo, el de la flotilla lo guardo para despu���������s.

me parece que son gente seria, a pesar de esa razon, prefiero ir paso a paso. muchas gracias por su atencion.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Egg,   Unknown
content.summary: While i was taking  pictures near to my house many crafts were in the sky, the day after i realize they were cauhgt  by my camera,
